summary: REQ-13 appears implemented: frontend/index.html now includes a single Google Search Console verification meta tag inside the <head>. No evidence in the diff summary indicates changes to prohibited files. However, additional unrequested changes were made to project metadata/summary files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/state file (project_state.json) beyond inserting the requested meta tag.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to add a single meta tag to frontend/index.html and explicitly disallowed adding other SEO/third-party verification methods; updating project state metadata is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt (project summary/documentation update) not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: The only requested code change is adding a Google Search Console meta tag to frontend/index.html; updating summary documentation is not part of REQ-13.
